    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">A Family Tree 2</string>
            <string language="en">A Family Tree 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Stammbaum 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un Arbre de Famille 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma Árvore De Família 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un Albero Di Famiglia 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα οικογενειακό δέντρο 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un Árbol De Familia 2</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">In this drag’n’drop exercise you can check yourself on the family words in the previous exercise, A Family Tree 1.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 5 - Who Are You?</string>
            <string language="en">In this drag'n'drop exercise you can check yourself on the family words in the previous exercise, A Family Tree 1. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 5 - Who Are You?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">family</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="sv">tree</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">family</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">tree</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser drag'n'drop Übung können Sie auf den 
Familie Wörtern in der vorhergehenden Übung, ein Stammbaum 1 sich 
überprüfen. Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - 
Modul 5 - die Sie sind?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cet exercice de drag'n'drop vous pouvez vous 
contrôler sur les mots de famille dans l'exercice précédent, un 
arbre de famille 1. Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour les 
débutants - module 5 - qui sont vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste exercício do drag'n'drop você pode 
verificar-se nas palavras da família no exercício precedente, uma 
árvore de família 1. Safir - vida do inglês e de 
funcionamento para os novatos - módulo 5 - que são você?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa esercitazione del drag'n'drop potete 
controllarsi sulle parole della famiglia nell'esercitazione 
precedente, un albero di famiglia 1. Safir - inglese e vita 
attiva per i principianti - modulo 5 - che sono voi?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την άσκηση drag'n'drop μπορείτε να 
ελεγχθείτε στις οικογενειακές λέξεις στην προηγούμενη άσκηση, 
ένα οικογενειακό δέντρο 1. Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά 
ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 5 - που είναι εσείς;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este ejercicio del drag'n'drop usted puede 
controlarse en las palabras de la familia en el ejercicio anterior, un
árbol de familia 1. ¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los 
principiantes - módulo 5 - que son usted?</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
